thread.title: Schoolboy Q Girl Power Sweatshirt Grammys 2017 - Schoolboy Q and Daughter Wear Pink at Grammys 2017

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Schoolboy Q Girl Power Sweatshirt Grammys 2017 - Schoolboy Q and Daughter Wear Pink at Grammys 2017
text:
Schoolboy Q is serving ultimate dad goals at the Grammys red carpet. The rapper (whose real name is Quincy Hanley) says he's not big on awards shows, but he changed his mind for the Grammy Awards when his daughter Joyce told him she wanted to go. Although she's attending the ceremony to support her father—who's nominated for Best Rap Performance and Best Rap Album—he supported her back with his clothing choice. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Hanley went low-key with a bright pink hoodie reading "GIRL POWER," and let his little girl steal the show with a Gucci suit in the same color.
Billboard / Twitter
